r.s: Abstract base class for HTML classes (PHP5 port of HTML_Common package).
r.d: HTML_Common2 package provides methods for HTML code display and attributes handling. * Provides methods to set, remove, merge HTML attributes. * Handles global document options (charset, linebreak and indentation characters). * Provides methods to handle indentation and HTML comments (useful in subclasses).
r.n: * HTML_Common2::getOption() now returns an array of all options if no option name is given (see request #11209), setOption() can accept an array of options * Implemented hasClass() / addClass() / removeClass() methods for working with element's CSS classes (see request #10191). * Packaging fixes: added AllTests.php, updated PEAR installer dependency
